title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: To anyone who staked more than 100evmos before July 14, 2022, you can check now your airdrop of rebuschain. Its almost the same with evmos criteria before to claim all airdrop %. There are task needed to do before getting all. Right now they already unlock 20% from the snapshot and you can do two of the open task but the voting is already pass.Check out the details of the airdrop announcement here. https://twitter.com/RebusChain/status/1570331877168517122?t=vzPbLopJaMF4bslppHEDtA&s=19
